entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TabbedPage Barbackground visual bug when using Linear or Radial GradientBrush #12324
  • .NET MAUI iOS can't debug or publish arm-64 without iossimulator-x64 #12323
  • Need the option to modify the visibility of the XAML code-behind class so as to hide it from library consumers #12322
  • Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException : Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps.Map. #12320
  • Permissions always returns "Granted" for Permissions.Photos in .net MAUI #12319
  • .Net Maui missing DPad for android TV #12318
  • Unable to reflect assembly of MAUI application on macOS #12317
  • Release throws exception with local styles since last VS update #12316
  • [iOS] CarouselView with CollectionView as ItemTemplate: apply HorizontalOptions Content inside carousel card is truncated #12315
  • Shell Navigation in OnAppearing Causes Fault on Windows #12313
  • [Android] Listview Header content disappears while scrolling #12312

Closed

  • Unfocus fixed except for scroll containers #12290
  • Intermittent crash when navigating to a page containing images #9011
  • ImageSource FromFile Android internal bug? #8809
    .NET 7 Planning
  • CollectionView stopped to work after VS update to 17.3.0 Preview 2.0 #8178
  • CollectionView throws Recycled-Exception while loading Images with Web-URL #9712
    Backlog
  • Crash on scrolling collection view #11130
    Backlog
  • Carousel issue - Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap android.graphics.Bitmap #10032
    Backlog
  • CarouselView inside CollectionView throws Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap' #11519
    Backlog
  • Android keyboard accessibility skipping control #12314
  • Toolbar Secondary Items Displaying like Primary Items in IOS #12140
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial Commit for third party notice file #12321

Merged

  • [android] remove Xamarin.AndroidX.Legacy.Support.V4 #12232
  • Update image source after recycling bitmap in custom target #12310
    area/image :framed_picture:

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12102
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
